channel.title: The FBI came to my house today. (ADDED PICS I TOOK OF THE CARD HE LEFT)
channel.description:
My sister got permenantly muted about 2 weeks ago for something she said about 7 months ago.
She was joking around and said she was going to go to school and shoot some people.
Today had a knock at the door and my mom answered, and a guy asked for me.
I came to door, he flashed me a badge, "I'm FBI Agent McDowell, and I need to ask you a few questions."
I was thinking "What the hell did I do?"
My sister thought I hacked something because they asked to talk to me.
The guy asked me if I played any online games.
I said "Yes."
He asked if I used the screen name Katies Nooby. (which happened to be my sisters RuneScape name)
I said no, and my sister told him she did.
He asked her about it and she told him she was joking, he laughed a little bit and was a pretty nice guy.
He said she wasn't in trouble or anything and took a few notes and left.
The whole situation I found hilarious, because the FBI came over something said on RuneScape.
Did Jagex call the FBI lmao?
[img]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/8522/fbikv3.jpg[/img] [img]http://img159.imageshack.us/img159/728/fbi2yj8.jpg[/img]

item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

rabcarl:

And a word of advice to the author of this thread (if you’re telling the truth) dont do anything else wrong I bet they have a shit load of monitoring software on ur pc.

They wouldn’t do that unless you’ve made attempts (failed or succeeded) to hack their boxes, or anything similar.

item.source: The FBI came to my house today. (ADDED PICS I TOOK OF THE CARD HE LEFT)

item.title: The FBI came to my house today. (ADDED PICS I TOOK OF THE CARD HE LEFT)
item.dc:creator: @rabcarl rabcarl
item.description:
@rabcarl wrote:

I find it unlikely that the FBI investigates every threat made online. The logistics are just impossible. I can’t remember how many times I’ve told someone I was going to kill them in rs and other games and no one’s said anything yet.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 19, 2007, 11:51:37 PM[/size][hr][quote=“gokon, post:99, topic:126661”]ok i scanned through the pages of this, and noticed that no one even considered the fact that the FBI has 0 jurisdiction over what happens outside of the US. jagex is in britain, also known as OUTSIDE OF THE US. this means that the FBI has no right to do anything with jagex’s servers. as for the pictures, that business card could have easily been faked.[/quote]
But the words were still typed in the U.S.? Does that count? also I’m sure that if the FBI called england and said “we need info about what people have been typing” they would give it over.

And a word of advice to the author of this thread (if you’re telling the truth) dont do anything else wrong I bet they have a shit load of monitoring software on ur pc.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @gokon gokon
item.description:
@gokon wrote:

ok i scanned through the pages of this, and noticed that no one even considered the fact that the FBI has 0 jurisdiction over what happens outside of the US. jagex is in britain, also known as OUTSIDE OF THE US. this means that the FBI has no right to do anything with jagex’s servers. as for the pictures, that business card could have easily been faked.

Read full topic
